body.name: LAEFLAEK Portable Monitor, 15.6" 1080P for Laptop, HDMI USB-C Travel HDR Monitor Extender for Display PC Mac Phone PS5 Xbox Switch with Smart Cover
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 32 mins
features: 【FHD IPS Portable Monitor】15.6” laptop monitor with 1920*1080 contrast ratio 1000:1 resolution renders clear and bright color. IPS portable laptop monitor supports 178°viewing angles, low blue light, 60Hz no flickering, eye-care, and makes it easier to watch for a long time.

【Portable Monitors Plug & Play】Portable laptop monitor with 2 Full-feature type-c and mini HDMI ports. Note: Some devices support reverse power supply so that you can use the monitor with only USB-C cable without additional power supply. In order to reach the high brightness and long use time, please connect the monitor to additional power supply all the time

【Ultra Slim Portable Display 】 As a laptop screen extender, Easy connection to most laptops, smartphones, PC, PS4, Xbox, Switch, and more. HDR mode can provide a vivid image while gaming and watching movies.LAEFLAEK monitor is thin and just the right size to fit easily into handbags and backpacks.

【Design for Improved Work Efficiency 】Portable laptop monitor equipped with two full-featured type-c ports and a mini HDMI port. Multiple display modes: Copy Mode/Extended Mode/Second Screen Mode anytime and anywhere to improve work efficiency.

【Package Contents & Warranty】 Portable Monitor’s Package includes 1 x 15.6'' Portable Monitor, 1 x USB-C to USB-A Cable, 1 x USB-C to USB-C Cable,1 x Mini-HDMI to HDMI Cable, 1 x 30W Power Adapter, 1 x Magnetic Smart Cover, 1 x User Manual. Please feel free to message LAEFLAEK via "Contact Seller"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb Portable Screen
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this portable monitor for my home office and I am extremely impressed with its performance and versatility. The monitor is sleek and lightweight, making it easy to take with me on the go. I can simply fold it up and toss it in my bag when I need to work from a coffee shop or a friend's house.The picture quality is fantastic, with vibrant colors and sharp resolution. I can easily connect it to my laptop via HDMI and get to work right away. The monitor also has built-in speakers, which is a great feature for when I need to watch a video or give a presentation.One of the things I appreciate most about this portable monitor is its multi-functionality. It can be used as a second screen for my laptop, a gaming monitor, or even as a TV. I can connect it to my gaming console and enjoy a larger screen for my games, or I can connect it to my streaming device and watch my favorite shows on a bigger screen.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of this portable monitor. It has exceeded my expectations in terms of picture quality, versatility, and portability. I would highly recommend it to anyone in need of a portable monitor for work or entertainment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I business travel a lot, and working off a single screen is exhausting due to feeling limited. I bit the bullet and got the monitor and I was so glad I did. It hooks up easily and works as advertised. This means I'm more productive in front of a screen when traveling as I'm not limited in what I can do. It already went on a few trips with me and it has made such a great difference in the time it took me to complete tasks.The colors are great, and the screen stays propped up without issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A second screen is helpful with school work.
reviews.reviewText: Very compact and almost the size of my laptop screen. I do a lot of writing in my current classes and having a second screen for my sources to read as I write it helps a lot. I like that it only takes on cable to make it work, usb C, and the cover that it has bends and turns into a stand. It is bright and with a good resolution but I wish It can save the brightness setting once turned off. It even has speakers that have a decent volume but I prefer the ones on my laptop. It's pretty thin and fits in my laptop case but I don't take it to go often. It came with a few other type of connections for laptops and PCs that do not have a USB C, but with other type of connection, hdmi for example, it also need to be connected to a power cable. USB C makes is easier, and the cable included is quite long. I didn't notice no delays in response time or any other connection difficulties so far and it has improved the productivity of the time I use for my school work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value, the speakers are suboptimal.
reviews.reviewText: So far so good, I got this monitor because I wanted a portable screen to travel and use for work and gaming at hotels.So far so good, it was plug and play with my laptop (USB-C) I was very happy that it came with 2 different cables to use with different set ups.My only "complain" are the speakers. You are better off using your laptop speakers, and or setup a bluetooth speaker to get quality sound. The speakers were one of the reasons why I got this specific monitor but they are not what I expected.The rest of the features are great. It even comes with a plug in for headphones. I will update the review in a few months after a few more trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use when I travel. It works great for a second screen to my laptop. It could have a little clearer view, but still works great. There are buttons on the side to adjust the brightness level. Lightweight as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grate picture quality
reviews.reviewText: Use as second phone screen and my ps5 grate for travel fits in my backpack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces I love this extra monitor!
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy it was to set up. I did have to look at reviews to figure out how to get the stand to work. Worked right away took 5 minutes to set up. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it for its price
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this monitor for few days now (for work) and It’s working great for what I am using it for.Pros:- Easy to use. Just plug and play- It’s big enough for an extra screen and small enough for me to carry outdoor.- I like that it has speakers- The screen color is OK- AffordableCons:- The screen color is a bit faded- Speakers are too low even on it’s max setting (Which is fine as I don’t expect myself to use that feature often)
